messages.subject: PMK Fanfic idea
messages.msgSnippet: someone run with this idea please.... According to the new translation of one of the 3-hajime.com pages Abe Juro (a survivor from the Itou Affair) said...
messages.messageBody:
someone run with this idea please....

According to the new translation of one of the 3-hajime.com pages
Abe Juro (a survivor from the Itou Affair) said...

"Saitoo Ichiroo was untidy with women. He was familiar with a woman
in (4) Shimabara, and since she became a (5) Geisya in (6) Gion later,
he often visited her in Gion. At that time, we lived in Takadaiji.
Because of this woman, Saitoo Ichiroo escaped from us. "

now in PMK you have a cross dressing Yamazaki Susumu...okay I admit
this goes in the yaoi category but wouldn't it be interesting if PMK
Saitou always departs from Itou and his minions to visit a certain
attractive lady to pass info back to Shinsengumi headquarters ^_^

*imagine PMK Yamazaki working in the red-light district @_@
